ComicInfo.Summary:
The Origin of Vampirella concludes! The startling events of the last two issues have left Vampi's life shattered, her identity erased. But the worst is yet to come: an epic battle in the skies over Drakulon and a final confrontation with the one person she's never wanted to fight. What will be left of Vampirella after she's put through her toughest trial ever?
Vampirella fights in hell, and Lilith is awakened.
ComicInfo.Title: Source, Part 3
